Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface SlotDAOInterface

public interface SlotDAOInterface
Interface for Slot Data Access Object (DAO) operations

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      slotId - The ID of the slot
      Returns:
      ResultSet containing slot details if found, else null
